metadata.title: CVE-2023-52815 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/vkms: fix a possible null pointer dereferenceIn amdgpu_vkms_conn_get_modes(), the return value of drm_cvt_mode()is assigned to mode, which will lead to a NULL pointer dereferenceon failure of drm_cvt_mode(). Add a check to avoid null pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
